div.head: hede Court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem quarto die mensis octobris Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo
nonagesimo

Quo die dominus Johannes ruthirfurd de tarlane miles electus
fuit in officium prepositure pro anno Instante prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die Thomas fyf Andreas branche thomas mar et Andreas
Culane electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro anno Instante prestitis solitis
Juramentis

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Duncanus straloche Andreas nauchty
et alexander allansone electi fuerunt in officium seriandorum pro Instante
anno prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Johannes Kobysone procurator Johannis Knollis in hac parte
accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu x s'
sibj annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex
occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Roberti blinsele ex australi et terram
alexandri logy ex boriali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo balheluy
Andrea Scot et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die Robertus blinsell solempniter protestatus fuit quod quicquid actum
dictum uel factum fuerat per Johannem Knollis et suos procuratores in processu dicte
terre non cedat sibi heredibus suis aut assignatis in preiudicium

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister Alexander fyf capellanus altaris beate marie
virginis infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicholaij de abirdene situati et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo redditu duorum s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente quondam Johannis club Jacente in le greyne ex orientali parte
aque ductus inter terram eiusdem quondam Johannis ex australi ex vna et terram quondam alexandri
Kyntor ex boreali partibus ex altera ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in terra tanquam primo die
huius processus testibus Willelmo gray Waltero atkin burgensibus et philippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Alexander rede de petfodellis procurator in hac parte
pro ista vice admissus dominum de bernis protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
sex s' sibj annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico inferiore
ecclesie ex boriali parte eiusdem vici inter terram alexandri sanquhar ex australi et
terram Jacobi Kennarty ex orientali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in
Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus gilberto mureson' Willelmo
coupar et alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus Kintor protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo Redditu quatuor s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in superiore parte vici nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici
inter terram quondam Willelmi nevisone ex australi et terram Andree
ranisone ex boreali partibus ex altera et terram quondam Jacobi nevyson' ex
orientali et communionem viam regiam versus austrum ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Willelmo balheluy
Andrea Scot et Duncano straloche seriando testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes Kynninmond' capellanus ac
procurator altaris beate Katherine infra ecclesiam cathedralem abirdonensis et protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto altari debit' annuatim de
duabus terris vastis Jacentibus in le greyne inter terram quondam hered' Johannis thome ex
australi ex vna et croftum fratrum predicatorum ex boriali partibus
ex altera ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus Willelmo balheluy Andrea Scot et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes stirueling capellanus ac procurator
altaris beate Katerine infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij de Abirdene situati et protesta
tus fuit pro vno annuo redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim de
bit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter terram alexandri chamer
de murchile ex boreali et terram capellanj altaris beate marie magdalene ex
australi et torrentem versus oriens et communionem viam regiam versus occidens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Duncano coupar et Willelmo cuminge et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die perlectis testibus processibus per Willelmum coupar productis de et super recupera
cione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum
in superiore parte vici nauium inter terram Donaldi gilfillane ex orientali et terra
dicti Williami ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam versus boriam in defectu solucionis
vnius annuj Redditu sex s' dicto Willelmo a longo tempore debit' et non solut'
Willelmus blinsele procurator ipsius Willelmi in hac parte peciit a ballivis secundum
formam suj processus precedentis Juris Justicie complementum Tunc curia
mature auisiata decreuit quod prefatus Willelmus possessionem et proprietatem
dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus
Et hoc pro Judicio datum fuit et ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris
Curie Teste curia

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus thome rollande vsque in proximam
Curiam capitalem propter debilitatem Curie

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio quinto die octobris
anno quo supra

the samyn day Jonhne of lammyngtone Sandy lammyngtone and William
cardny grantit tham awand' to Jonhne quhit yongar in Abirdour'
xl s' Ande Androw lammyntone grantit him avand' xxiij s' to
him And' the saide Androw sal releyf the saidis Jonhne lammingtone Sandy
lammynton' and William cardny of vij s' and vi d' of the saide xl s'

Eodem die Johannes quhit fecit et creauit thomam narne suum procuratorem
ad petendum recipiendum dictam peccuniam promittend' de Rato et grato

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Robert blinsele
forspekar that Jonhne rede Induellar of byrrone sal deliuer and pay
to William simsone opidane of leithe iiijc Ratheris and iij barrelis of fatt
gudis of the quhilkis the saide Williamis auentour is passit be
the preuis and witnes producit befor the saide assis' becaus' the saide
Jonhne hed nocht sic gudis lad in the schip callit mary of Wyst
mvire to the behuf of the said William as he promittit to do
And' atour the said William sal haue his iiij vnicornis agane
that he gaf for the fraucht of the said gudis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Sexto die octobris anno quo supra

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid matheson'
forspekar that Williame of leslie bocht the schip callit mary of Wyst
mvir' fra hermon' cornuale for xl crovnis and j franche crovne of gude
gewin him in ane goddis penny at the making' of this condicion

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem octauo die mensis Octobris anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo
nonagesimo

div.head: Consilium
div.p:
Alexander chamer
Robert blinsele
Dauid menyes yongar
Alexander rede
Jonhne colisone
mastir Androw cadiow
thomas prat
Jonhne Wormet
Alexander menyes
Androw murray
Wat auchneywe
Williame blinsele
Williame Kintor
Jonhne menyes
Jonhne of Knollis
Androw Culan yongar

the saide day it was statut and ordanit be consent of the aldirman
and the consale that thir ar personis befor writin chosin of consale for this
yer sal comper Ilkane friday within the tolbutht and sytt with the
aldirman and gyf him leile and trew Consale for the gude reule of the
towne and commone profyt for this Instant yer' Ande quhay absentis
him and cumis nocht sal pay Ilkane friday ane Inglis xij d' grotis
leswys' nay thai be lauchfull Impediment that thai may nocht cum
or ellis thai haue licence of the aldirman

the samyn day it was statut' and ordanit that ale baxtaris sale bak ij d'
brede contening xxxij vnce and penny brede contening xvj vnce gude
stuff cleyne and weilbakin bredis vndir the pane of law quhilk
salbe excut' apone the brekaris of this Statut' with Rigoure

Williame goldsmitht Williame fywe Jonhne andirson'
Donald strathachin' James Kennarty thome gardinar
henry hourvm Jonhne thomsone Dauid spens
and Androw philpsone

In the evin quartar philp Dumbrek seriand'
Jonhne Walcar and Williame cuming Cunnaris
In the Crukit quartar Duncan straloche seriand'
Henry tulidef and george pottar cunnaris
In the grene quartar Androw nachty seriand'
patrik Wys' and William Wobstar cunnaris
In futy quartar alexander allanson' seriand'
Robert scleiche and Duncan heruy cunnaris

the saide day it was concludit and deliuerit be the aldirman and consale
that ale personis that is awand' ony gudis or money to the towne
and Sanct Nicholes werk be akis or vthirwais sal mak and
gif compt rekning and pament to the towne

the saide day Jonhne Wormet at comawnd' of the aldirman and the
consal gaf xl s' of his wattir maile of this next yer to cum
to Richerd Wricht for the reparacion of the Intymmir of the stepill

the samyn day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman and consal that nay man
by kelinge to corff vnto the tyme the towne be seruit and quhil ane hour'
eftir nowne be passit vndir the payne of eschett and ane vnlaw
vnforgewin' et cetera

head.add: Ale thingis aucht to the tovne salbe payt

div.p:
the samyn day it was decretit and deliuerit be the consale that ale personis
awand' ony gudis to the towne sall gyf compt rekning and pament to the
towne of the Somes and gudis that thai rest awand' be akis and vthir ways

the samyn day it was statutit ordanit and deliuerit be the consale with avys'
of the aldirman balyes for the common proffit of the towne that Jonhne fechat
at the key sall haue of Ilkan barrell of gudis of all Induellaris of the
towne and hamwart to the portis of abirdene ane half penny and of the
pipe iij half pennys ande of the towne iij d' And' of the fremmyt folkis
outwarte j half demi of the barrell iij obul' of the pipe and iij d' of the towne
all girnall gudis beinge fre for the quhilkis the saide Jonhne sall
reforme byge vphald and reperall ale the beknynnis the key the
common draucht of the saide burgh' and mak ringis at the key to
loys' ande layde vndir and abewne Ande to claysp it and bynde it with
yrne leyde and lange bande stanys' deuly in ale thingis as efferis
be the sicht avys' and ordinance of the aldirman balyeis and consale
for the tyme to the kepinge of the quhilkis the saide Jonhne is oblist be
his landis gudis and handis vphaldin' ale fraude and gile avay putt

the samyn day it was statut and ordanit be the aldirman and consale that ale candilmakaris
that makis candill to Sell sal mak and Sele sex vnce of wele maide
candill dry wekis for j d' and sell tham be wecht
the samyn day magis patonson' conuict' for breuing of xij d' aile

The samyn day Dauid mar' preuit that William howat is awand' him
iij li' and iiij s' scottis money with William verty and Androw ellot suorne the
gret aithe that thai bystude herde saw and for witnes was tane quhen
the saide Dauid pait to William brone his gude fadir iij li' and iiij s' for the
saide William howat quhilkis was allouit him in his barnis part of gudis
Curia tenta xio die octobris

the saide the action' debatabile betuix mathow culan and Androw culan his
assignez and procurator one that ane part Ande Agnes club the relict of
vmquhil thomas culan dependinge was continevit for xxi dais be the
aldirman and the consale in siclik strintht forme and effect as it hede obefor
but preiudice tile ony party that the saide agnes may pas' and haue hir
husbandis avys' in the saide matir and that thai to do that day that accordis
of law the corne standand' vndir arrest as obefor

the samyn day the balyes assignit this day xv dais to William of Kintor
to ansuer to the borghe strekit apon' him be William moir' for the wrang
uys' halding fra him of j barrel of Salmond'
the samyn day bessy cafkin conuict' for breuing of xij d' aile
Curia balliuorum legalis tenta in pretorio xix die octobris Anno quo supra

div.head: Assisa pro Inquisicione Agnetis cantale
div.p:
thomas prat Walterus auchneywe Andreas culan Junior thomas chamer
Johannes menyeis Dauid spens Dauid prat thomas cullan Andreas
andirson' magister Richardus craufurde Willelmus portar Willelmus
andirson et Johannes andirson' Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus cantale
patruus agnetis cantale latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus
ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra sine
tenemento Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam magistri Willelmi vmfray ex australi ex vna et
terram Johannis colison' ex boreali partibus ex altera et communiones vias regias
versus oriens et occidens Et quod dicta Aques est legittima et propinquior
heres dicti quondam patruj suj de dicta terra Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod
valet per annum ij marcas et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite
de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in
manibus domini nostri regis per vnum mensem in defectu heredis Jus suum minime
prosequentis

Eodem die prepositus balliui et diuersi consilij et communitatis consesserunt licenciam
suam Andream murray seniori ad construendum vnum altare infra ecclesiam
beati nicholaij de abirdene ex australi parte eiusdem

the samyn day it was statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis and consale
that ale baxtaris sale haue bakin brede gude stuf kepand' pas' ale or
part of tham to serue the towne vndir the payne of Secludinge of the
craft and ane Amerciament vnforgevin' and nay baxtar sal draw brede out
of the oyne quhill thai warne the balyeis to wey thar brede and se that
it hald' xxvj vnce

the samyn day the balyeis gert call Dauid strathachin' and Wat mernys to ansuer
to the borghe' strekit apone tham be thome litill Jonhne for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of compt rekning and pament of xxxvj barrellis of beir meile
and peys' quhilkis comperit nocht quharfor the balyeis chargit Duncan straloche officiar'
to tak ane distres' fra tham and latt it tham to borghe' gyf it be askit and to
warne tham to comper one friday that next cumis to ansuer to the saide burghe'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die octobris
anno quosupra

Eodem die dominus Dauid Waus vicarius de banf ac heres quondam Roberti
Waus auj suj Renunciauit omni Juri et Juris clameo proprietati et possessioni
pro se heredibus suis ac suis assignatis que et quas habet habuit aut habere
poterit in et ad terram Jacentem in vico castri ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram
Symonis gardin ex orientali et terram quondam Willelmi moyses ex occidentali
et communionem viam regiam versus boriam et torrentum Sancte trinitatis
versus austrum Ita quod ipse dominus Dauid heredis suj et suj assignati
ab eadem sint exclusi Imperpetuum pro quadam certa summa peccunie sibi
per murthacum glenmaluyn solut' Testibus domino Johanne ruthirfurd preposito
alexandro chamer de murchile Roberto blinsele alexandro chamer filio Johannes colison'
Willelmo blinsel Willelmo Kintor patricio rede burgensibus thoma fyf
Andrea branche thoma mar' tribus balliuorum antedictorum philippo
Dunbrek Duncano straloche alexandro allanson' tribus seriandorum et
Johanne Williamsone Judicatore Curie et inde dictus murthacus
peciit a me dicto Johanne stirueling' Instrumentum

the samyn day murthou glenmaluyn grantit him avand' to mav
nis Wormet xl s' and ger' him be pait tharof or ellis pay
him within terme of law

the samyn day Androw philpsone grantit him avand' to Robert
huntar xx s' of lent Siluer

the samyn day murtho glenmaluyn was fundin' avand' xvj s' of fraucht
to thome Waus be ane suorne assis' Androw Culan yongar'
forspekar

the saide day thome Wodman was conuikit be ane assis' for the
forstallinge of the burge' of woll and skinnis

the saide day the balyeis ordanit Duncan straloche seriand' to pass' and
tak ane distres' fra James Kennarty and latt it to borghe' gif
it be askit Ande warne him to comper one monunday to
ansuer to the borghe strekit apon' him be thome prat for the wran
guis' haldin fra him of vj li' for certan franche clatht
